divs: Sighting DetailsI was hiking in the woods behind my house with two other friends at about 10:45 when I simply noticed a giant ball of fire that flew across the sky in a straight line very fast. My two other friends were seeing the same thing. It stopped for a few seconds, changed shape multiple times and then moved away from the planet extremely fast. It changed my personal views about the existence of UFO's. I captured a crappy video with my smartphone which i will somehow upload at a later date.
